scripts.build-component-development: npm run build-component-assets && component-build --dev --standalone tombo --name index
scripts.build-component-production: npm run build-component-assets && component-build --standalone tombo --name tombo --out . && uglifyjs tombo.js --output tombo.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-component-production && npm run doc
scripts.clean-deep: rm -rf components node_modules && npm run clean
scripts.test: npm run build-component-development && mocha --recursive --compilers ls:LiveScript --reporter dot --timeout 1s --slow 75 --bail
